---
title: "How bad Washington wizzards is"
---
By Tianlu Zhu, HuaYuan Chu, Leqi Ying ,Yiqun Zhaoo

As basketball fans who live around DC, the basketball team that we care the most is the the home team of DC, the Washington Wizards. The Washington Wizards end up with only 15 wins in a 82 game season, which is the second worst team in the eastern conference. 

Our project is trying to use the data of the wizards 2023-2024 seasons , with the advance data visiualization skill we learned , to prove how bad Washington wizzards is. We doing it as several perspecive, team performance , player performance and shooting performance.
